Bindings.Binding: if AtlasLootCharDB["QuickLooks"][1] then if AtlasFrame and AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel_Preset1:Click() end end
if AtlasLootCharDB["QuickLooks"][2] then if AtlasFrame and AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel_Preset2:Click() end end
if AtlasLootCharDB["QuickLooks"][3] then if AtlasFrame and AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel_Preset3:Click() end end
if AtlasLootCharDB["QuickLooks"][4] then if AtlasFrame and AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel_Preset4:Click() end end
if AtlasFrame and AtlasFrame:IsVisible() then AtlasLootPanel_WishList:Click() end
